name: Find a Light: a journey(final demo)
name_original: Find a Light: a journey(final demo)
description:
hello, one last update at the end of this chaotic year 

 how to play :

use: up, down, left, right arrows to move around, pay attention to your light.

I was finally able to finish my android game find a light: a journey, after months of development and since I uploaded a demo here, I wanted to post an update and to tell ya, it's out on google play.

this small demo shows two levels of the game, where's a small butterfly was left alone and the light was taken away, play through the different stages to find missing friends and restore light.

btw, I had to make changes so the game can run on web browsers the google play version has all the main functions:)

have fun :)
